scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && npm run lint && git add . && git commit -m "ğŸš€ Auto-deploy: $(date)" && git push
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && npm run lint && npm run type-check && git add . && git commit -m "ğŸš€ Production Deploy: $(date)" && git push && vercel --prod
scripts.deploy:quick: git add . && git commit -m "âš¡ Quick Deploy: $(date)" && git push
scripts.deploy:feature: npm run build && npm run lint && git add . && git commit -m "âœ¨ Feature Deploy: $(date)" && git push
scripts.deploy:fix: npm run build && npm run lint && git add . && git commit -m "ğŸ› Bug Fix: $(date)" && git push
scripts.pre-commit: npm run lint && npm run type-check
scripts.status: git status && echo "\nğŸ“Š Build Status:" && npm run build
scripts.rollback: git log --oneline -10 && echo "\nTo rollback: git reset --hard <commit-hash>"
